content: hi all. After Madrid, @Ewout Kramer and I cam up to Norway for meetings, including a joint meeting with openEHR which I will report on shortly. But over the weekend, we went kayaking in the Naeroyfjord. A few people have asked about it, so here's a quick summary:
Wow Great pictures and places. Lovely to see you have time off from FHIR.
Fresh air and openEHR! Enjoyed the pictures of the former (looked like a NZ South Island winter) and looking forward to reading your report on the later.
